attributes.action: Upon Her Death Queen Elizabeth II shoul be restyled Queen Eluzabeth "The Great"
attributes.additional_details: Queen Elizabeth II is arguably this nations greatest even monarch, overseeing 60 years of unprecidented social, political, economic, cultural and constitutional change. Upon her death it is proposed that she become the first English monarch since Alfred (died 899) to have her name appended with the term "The Great"!
